fields.name: Gozo Concrete Cotton Jar
fields.description: This cotton jar provides a wide space for storing cotton swabs, cotton balls or cosmetic pads. Made from concrete, it has a clean lined base topped with a rounded lid which has a matching knob handle for an easy lift. Functional and decorative, this jar will keep the bathroom tidy and will look elegant sitting on the shelf with its terrazzo design.

fields.name: Gozo Concrete Lotion Dispenser
fields.description: This concrete lotion dispenser will be a striking addition to the modern bathroom with its gold finished push top which allows an effortless release of soap when pressed. The luxe pump is contrasted with multicoloured terrazzo effect accentuated on the muted grey surface. Style and coordinate it with the Gozo tumbler or soap dish for a likewise visual appeal.

fields.name: Gozo Concrete Soap Dish
fields.description: This concrete soap dish features a muted grey finish base with a multicoloured terrazzo effect on it. The dish has an oval design with a slight depth in its centre to keep soap in place. Style and pair it with the Gozo tumbler or cotton jar to bring a sophisticated visual appeal on the bathroom shelf.

fields.name: Gozo Concrete Tumbler
fields.description: Made from robust concrete, this tumbler will be a durable as well as stylish addition to the modern bathroom. Its muted grey finish surface is decorated with a multicoloured terrazzo effect whichproduced an eye-catching pattern. Style and coordinate it with the Gozo lotion dispenser or soap dish for a likewise visual appeal.

fields.name: Gray & Osbourn No.4 Leopard Vase
fields.description:
Our Gray & Osbourn No.4 Leopard Vase will definitely add character to your home. A striking mix of brown and amber infused tones, this glass vase would serve best as a traditional vase to house flowers, or modernised with some dried flowers or pampas grass stems.
W14cm x H40cm
Wipe clean with a dry cloth.

The geometric weave design on this rattan table lamp is a bold statement for any living room Finished in grey plenty of light escapes through the breaks in the shade design which is attached to a solid grey base which complements all modern interiors Bulb not included but we recommend a E27 Golf Ball 7W LED Bulb.
L.17 x W.17 x H.20cm

The mirror glass is surrounded by a stunning metal trim that will add a stylish touch to any room making it look bigger and brighter. Brand: Julian Bowen.
H.128 x W.38 x D.3.5cm. Weight 6.8kg.

fields.name: Living Nostalgia Sage Biscuit Tin
fields.description:

Keep your favourite biscuits fresh for longer in this elegant biscuit tin. This robust and practical steel canister is decorated in Living Nostalgia's classic style, with a powder-coated finish. Simply delicious! Like all of KitchenCraft's Living Nostalgia creations, this tin is inspired by the functional forms and vintage character of times gone by. The soft colours complement traditional and modern kitchens, giving an understated look that blends in with any setting. As a final decorative touch, the container is printed with the word 'BISCUITS'. So whether you've baked a fresh batch of cookies at home, or you've treated yourself to a pack of custard creams, you'll always know where to look for the next sugary snack. Measures 14.5 x 19 cm (6 in x 7.5 inches). Hand-wash only. This tin is made of robust steel, for a lightweight yet durable construction - just like biscuit tins used to be. It has the same tall design as KitchenCraft's other popular Living Nostalgia storage canisters. Its square footprint maximises space on the kitchen worktop, and it can sit neatly on a shelf with other storage tins too. The biscuit tin has a tight-fitting lid, which keeps your biscuits crisp and delicious for longer (if you can resist eating them!). Though the lid fits snugly on top of the tin, you won't need to break any nails to get it open. The easy-open handle means you only need to give a gentle tug to pop the lid off.

fields.name: Living Nostalgia Sage Bread Bin
fields.description: The KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia large metal bread bin combines timeless vintage design with everyday practicality. The robust steel box keeps your fresh bread fresher for longer, and is big enough to accommodate a large family loaf. The bread bin is made of robust steel, with a soft English Sage powder coated finish. This stylish and sturdy designs harks back to the days of vintage kitchenware, when things were made to last - complemented with a delicate charm that brings a sense of timelessness to any decor. As a final touch, the bread box has attractive ridge detailing and the word 'BREAD' printed across its front. It works well in both modern and traditional kitchens, and makes a lovely gift for anyone who enjoys making their own bread, or appreciates vintage style. Robust, Lightweight and Practical. The clever folks at KitchenCraft have designed this bread bin to be very durable yet lightweight and convenient. The bin has a traditional top-opening lid, plus riveted handles on the side, so it's easy to move it from your kitchen countertop to a pantry or cupboard. You could even bring it straight to the table and let guests help themselves to some delicious crusty bread. The Living Nostalgia collection features bucolic enamel bakeware, sturdy steel canisters, vintage-style scales, handy housekeeping boxes and much more. Measures 34 x 21.5 x 25 cm (13.5 x 8.5 x 10 inches)

fields.name: Living Nostalgia Sage Cake Tin
fields.description: Preserve your freshly baked cakes for longer in this timeless two-piece cake tin. The robust and practical steel container has an airtight seal for freshness, and is decorated in Living Nostalgia's classic farmhouse style. Like all of KitchenCraft's Living Nostalgia creations, this domed cake tin is inspired by the functional forms and vintage character of times gone by. The soft English Sage powder-coated finish complements traditional and modern homes, giving it an understated look that blends beautifully with any setting. As a final decorative touch, the container is printed with the word 'CAKE'. So whether you're baked a fresh Victoria sponge at home, or you've treated yourself to a mouth-watering cake from the farmer's market, you'll always know where to look for just one more slice! The domed cake tin has a tight-fitting lid and airtight silicone seal, so your cake stays fresh for serving. The brushed silver handle on the lid ensures a secure grip - you can even hold the tin from just the handle without the platter coming away from the lid! This tin comes in two parts, a cake plate and a domed lid. There's plenty of space inside for double- and even triple-layered cakes (just like they used to bake!). And best of all, you can use the platter base separately to present your baked creations.

fields.name: Living Nostalgia Sage Canisters
fields.description: Store your tea and coffee-making essentials with a touch of old-fashioned functionality and a sprinkle of style from yesteryear. Don't let spoilt tea bags, clumped sugar or stale coffee ruin your next brew. These KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia tea, coffee and sugar canisters feature tight-fitting lids to keep moisture out, and freshness locked in for longer. As well as being a practical addition to your kitchen's worktops, the set features plenty of vintage style. Each one is made of robust steel with a neat square base. You won't have any trouble telling these tea, coffee and sugar tins apart. As a final detail, each tin is finished with 'TEA', 'COFFEE' or 'SUGAR' printed across its front. Set includes tea, coffee and sugar canisters. Each measures 11 x 11 x 17 cm (4.5 x 4.5 x 6.5 inches). Hand-wash only. Finding a spot on a crowded worktop for these tea, coffee and sugar storage containers is easy. That's because the clever folks at KitchenCraft have given each piece soft curves and a compact, square footprint. You can neatly stow them away in corners, to make the most of every spare spot of space. Create a Vintage-Inspired Kitchen Storage Collection.

fields.name: Living Nostalgia Sage Mechanical Scales
fields.description: KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia knows that baking is more than just a hobby -it's a way of life. That's why it's created these mechanical kitchen scales. Their classic look is inspired by vintage kitchens, while their robust design harks back to a time of peerless craftsmanship. This set of scales features an old-fashioned dial, powered by a finely tuned mechanical mechanism. It's designed to be easy to read, and displays weights in imperial (lbs) and metric (kg) units, so it's easy to follow those classic recipes from vintage cookbooks. The dial is divided into increments of 20 grammes and one ounce for highly accurate measuring. More Information: Scales measure 30 x 25 cm (12 x 10 inches). Bowl is dishwasher safe. Scales are wipe-clean only. Features adjustment dial to calibrate mechanism. These mechanical kitchen scales are great for measuring out all manner of ingredients - from fruits to flour, butter to icing sugar. They feature an extra-large bowl made of high-quality stainless steel with a lovely mirror polished finish. The wide design means you can measure up to 4 kgs / 8.5 lbs in one go, and because it's stainless steel, it won't pick up flavours or odours. You can also flip the bowl and place it over the top of the scales for easy storage. Vintage kitchenware wasn't just useful - it was beautiful. KitchenCraft's Living Nostalgia collection takes cues from the rustic kitchens of the past, resulting in a range of convenient kitchen and household products that's equal parts pretty and practical.

fields.name: Tower Empire Bread Bin Grey
fields.description:
Tidily store your baked produce away within the durable structure of this bread bin. Supporting a rolltop lid to grant access to the contents inside, the quality stainless steel material features a black coated V shaped texturing to the roll top lid to add a splash of style across your kitchen side. The large capacity provides plenty of storage space to easily fit a variety of sized loaves, bagels, crumpets and muffins, complete with ventilation holes across the main body so your perishables remain fresher for a longer period of time. The durable metal design is also easy to clean, requiring just a simple wipe down with a damp cloth to maintain. This bread bin forms part of a wider empire kitchen collection which includes a range of essential kitchen and other domestic products, featuring canisters and a mug tree and towel pole set.
H.19 x W.39 x D.27.5cm.

fields.name: Tower Empire Set of 3 Canisters Grey
fields.description: This set of 3 Empire canisters is the perfect way to store your tea, coffee and sugar on your kitchen countertop. Each canister features a stylish grey body complimented by a mirrored finish lid with a unique V shaped pattern and topped off with polished elegant bronze accents around the base, providing an eye-catching addition to your kitchen decor. The capacity for each canister is 1.3 litres, which will ensure your contents will last a significant amount of time. The lids have been designed to include a large hoop that makes the canisters easier to open. They are also easy to maintain, requiring just a simple wipe to clean in order to maintain the quality finish. Dimensions for each canister are H14.50 x W13.50 x D11.00cm. This set forms part of the Empire range of kitchen products, which includes a towel pole, mug tree and bread bin.
